org.cloudfoundry.client.lib

类 CloudCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudfoundry.client.lib.CloudCredentials

  • public class CloudCredentials
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that encapsulates credentials used for authentication
    作者:
    Thomas Risberg

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CloudCredentials(CloudCredentials cloudCredentials, java.lang.String proxyForUser)
      Create proxy credentials.
      CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token)
      Create credentials using a token.
      CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token, java.lang.String clientId)
      Create credentials using a token.
      CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Create credentials using a token.
      CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Create credentials using email and password.
      CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String clientId)
      Create credentials using email, password, and client ID.
      CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret)
      Create credentials using email, password and client ID.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String password)
        Create credentials using email and password.
        参数:
        email - email to authenticate with
        password - the password

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.lang.String clientId)
        Create credentials using email, password, and client ID.
        参数:
        email - email to authenticate with
        password - the password
        clientId - the client ID to use for authorization

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(java.lang.String email,
                java.lang.String password,
                java.lang.String clientId,
                java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Create credentials using email, password and client ID.
        参数:
        email - email to authenticate with
        password - the password
        clientId - the client ID to use for authorization
        clientSecret - the secret for the given client

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token)
        Create credentials using a token.
        参数:
        token - token to use for authorization

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token,
                java.lang.String clientId)
        Create credentials using a token.
        参数:
        token - token to use for authorization
        clientId - the client ID to use for authorization

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token,
                java.lang.String clientId,
                java.lang.String clientSecret)
        Create credentials using a token.
        参数:
        token - token to use for authorization
        clientId - the client ID to use for authorization
        clientSecret - the password for the specified client

      • CloudCredentials

        public CloudCredentials(CloudCredentials cloudCredentials,
                java.lang.String proxyForUser)
        Create proxy credentials.
        参数:
        cloudCredentials - credentials to use
        proxyForUser - user to be proxied

        public boolean isProxyUserSet()
        Is this a proxied set of credentials?
        返回:
        whether a proxy user is set

      • proxyForUser

        public CloudCredentials proxyForUser(java.lang.String user)
        Run commands as a different user. The authenticated user must be privileged to run as this user.
        参数:
        user - the user to proxy for
        返回:
        credentials for the proxied user
